title: Premier King One Bedroom Suite Manhattan View
room_features:
Room Features

The Premier One Bedroom Suites are spectacularly spacious, with four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful city views. These suites feature 900 square feet and are located on floors 26 to 39.

Bed & Bath Experience

The one-bedroom Premier suite offers sweeping views of Manhattan. The suite features an entry foyer, expansive living room consisting of a sofa, armchairs and coffee table and side table. An executive writing desk and chair is located near the bedroom door. A wall mounted 40” TV hangs over the vanity fireplace, and a console with minibar completes the room. The bedroom consists of a plush king sized bed flanked by two nightstands with Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. An armchair and table is on the far side of the room. A 40” TV on a console is across the bed. The Turkish marble-clad bathroom, located in the bedroom features a glass enclosed shower, soaking tub with oversized showerheads, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro bath amenities.
short_info: The Premier One Bedroom Suites are spectacularly spacious, with four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful city views. These suites feature 900 square feet and are located on floors 26 to 39.
service_amenities:
Service includes 24 hour white gloved elevator attendants, Complimentary hotel Jaguar service subject to availability, an Award-winning Les Clefs d'Or Concierge team to assist guests.

In-room comforts feature Complimentary high speed wi-fi for up to 4 devices, 24 hour in-room dining service, Housekeeping daily service twice, Overnight complimentary shoe shine, Plush terry cloth robes & Pierre slippers, Exclusive Etro toiletries, On site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services, complimentary dog amenities (for pets up to 15 pounds), Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in. For a full list of our guest services and amenities click here.
additional-info: Featuring 900 square feet, Premier One Bedroom Suites are spectacularly spacious, with four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful city views. These suites are located on floors 26 to 39.
